description: Defines a class AppUser representing a user profile in the application, including properties and serialization methods.

classes.name: AppUser
classes.description: A class modeling a user profile with id, displayName, email, and optional avatarUrl, including toMap and fromMap methods for serialization.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Serializes AppUser instance to a Map<String, dynamic>.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Creates an AppUser instance from a Map<String, dynamic>.
